Online Banking with FREE Online Bill Pay
No stamps, envelopes, or checks to write give you more time to spend on the things you enjoy.


Real Estate Financing
Fast. Simple. Professional. Whether you are preparing to buy, build, purchase land, or construct new space, let Altoro Mutual's premier real estate lenders help with financing. As a regional leader, we know the market, we understand the business, and we have the track record to prove it


Business Credit Cards
You're always looking for ways to improve your company's bottom line. You want to be informed, improve efficiency and control expenses. Now, you can do it all - with a business credit card account from Altoro Mutual.

Retirement Solutions
Retaining good employees is a tough task. See how Altoro Mutual can assist you in accomplishing this feat through effective Retirement Solutions. 		Privacy and Security
The 2000 employees of Altoro Mutual are dedicated to protecting your privacy and security. We pledge to provide you with the information and resources that you need to help secure your information and keep it confidential. This is our promise.



Win an 8GB iPod Nano
Completing this short survey will enter you in a draw for 1 of 50 iPod Nanos. We look forward to hearing your important feedback.

Deposit Products

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of deposit products to help you meet your savings goals. From savings accounts to CDs, from money market accounts to IRAs, each account is designed to give you the best value for your money. Currently, Altoro Mutual is offering the following deposit products:

  • Personal Savings Accounts
  • CDs
  • Premium Money Market Accounts
  • Money Market Accounts
  • IRAs

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Note: all Altoro Mutual deposit accounts include free access to Altoro Mutualï¿½s secure, Online Banking site, where you can view account information, make payments and transfers and more. All this on the internet!

This page was last updated on: 10/12/2004

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of deposit products to help you meet your savings goals. From savings accounts to CDs, from money market accounts to IRAs, each account is designed to give you the best value for your money. Currently, Altoro Mutual is offering the following deposit products:

  • Personal Savings Accounts
  • CDs
  • Premium Money Market Accounts

  • IRAs

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of deposit products to help you meet your savings goals. From savings accounts to CDs, from money market accounts to IRAs, each account is designed to give you the best value for your money. Currently, Altoro Mutual is offering the following deposit products:

  • Personal Savings Accounts
  • CDs
  • Premium Money Market Accounts
  • Money Market Accounts
  • IRAs

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Note: all Altoro Mutual deposit accounts include free access to Altoro Mutualï¿½s secure, Online Banking site, where you can view account information, make payments and transfers and more. All this on the internet!

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Cards

Whether you are a student building credit or someone with an impressive credit history, an Altoro Mutual Credit Card provides the flexibility you need. Accepted at more than 20 million merchants worldwide, you'll enjoy savings and benefits that other credit cards can't match.

  • Altoro Platinum Card
  • Altoro Gold Card
  • Altoro Silver Card
  • Altoro Bronze Card
  • Altoro Student Card

No matter which Altoro Mutual credit card you choose ï¿½ you'll receive competitive interest rates and an impressive package of benefits. Youï¿½ll also have free access to Altoro Mutualï¿½s secure, Online Banking site, where you can view account information, make payments and transfers and more.

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Investments & Insurance

Through ongoing service, sound advice and direct access to a variety of investment products, Altoro Mutual can help you develop and reach your financial goals.

Whether you're looking for a short-term solution or a long-term investment strategy, Altoro Mutual offers a full range of account options to help you manage your investments including:

  • Brokerage Services
  • Retirement
  • Insurance
  • Private Banking
  • Wealth & Tax Services

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Inside Altoro

In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity. Altoro Mutual's success continues to be driven by its personalized customer service and product innovation.

Part of a Corporate Family

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

We're Not Like Other Banks

And you'll realize it right away. Altoro Mutual is about making things better for people ï¿½ our customers, employees and neighbors. We invite you to learn more about our community programs or to read our 2006 community annual report (PDF, 63KB).

Other Altoro Group sites: Altoro Private Bank, Altoro Wealth & Tax


In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity.

Employee Volunteering Programs

At Altoro Mutual, we encourage our employees to donate their time and energy to help their communities and even give our employees time off to do so. Some of our volunteer and giving programs include:

  • Matching Gift
  • Matching Time


Matching Gift

Altoro Mutual pledges to match employee contributions to any non-profit up to $15,000 per employee each year.

Matching Time

Altoro Mutual is proud of our employee volunteers and pledges to donate cash grants to the organizations where employees give their time.

For every 10 hours of volunteer time by an Altoro Mutual employee, we will donate $250 to the nonprofit organization. In total, employees can acquire up to $5,000 each calendar year for their nonprofits or schools.

If you are a non-profit organization, then help us help you. Contact Altoro Mutual for more information, or download this Brochure

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Inside Altoro

In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity. Altoro Mutual's success continues to be driven by its personalized customer service and product innovation.

Part of a Corporate Family

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

We're Not Like Other Banks

And you'll realize it right away. Altoro Mutual is about making things better for people ï¿½ our customers, employees and neighbors. We invite you to learn more about our community programs or to read our 2006 community annual report (PDF, 63KB).

Other Altoro Group sites: Altoro Private Bank, Altoro Wealth & Tax


In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity.

Altoro Mutual Announces Earnings Webcast & Teleconference Call for Third Quarter 2006 Financial Results

Oct-5-2006

Altoro Mutual will hold a presentation for the investment community on Thursday, October 26, 2006, at 11:00 a.m. ET (8:00 a.m. PT) to review third quarter 2006 financial results, which are scheduled to be released before the market opens that morning. A live webcast of the presentation will be hosted by Karl Fitzgerald, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer. A slide presentation will accompany the webcast and will be available on our home page at the time of the call.

Altoro Mutual Announces Prime Rate Increase

Sept-21-2006

Altoro Mutual has raised its prime rate to 5.25 percent from 5.00 percent, effective today. This follows a similar increase by the Federal Reserve Bank of 0.25 percent in its target for federal funds rate.

Bank Regulators Approve Altoro Mutualï¿½s Acquisition Plans

Aug-17-2006

Altoro Mutual today announced that their regulator has approved the company's acquisition plans. The company will be holding a special shareholders' meeting to vote on the transaction.

Assuming shareholder approval at that meeting, the transaction should close on December 1, 2006.

Inside Altoro

In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity. Altoro Mutual's success continues to be driven by its personalized customer service and product innovation.

Part of a Corporate Family

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

We're Not Like Other Banks

And you'll realize it right away. Altoro Mutual is about making things better for people ï¿½ our customers, employees and neighbors. We invite you to learn more about our community programs or to read our 2006 community annual report (PDF, 63KB).

Other Altoro Group sites: Altoro Private Bank, Altoro Wealth & Tax


In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity.

Altoro Mutual Announces Earnings Webcast & Teleconference Call for First Quarter 2006 Financial Results

Apr-13-2006

Altoro Mutual will hold a presentation for the investment community on Thursday, April 27, 2006, at 11:00 a.m. ET (8:00 a.m. PT) to review first quarter 2006 financial results, which are scheduled to be released before the market opens that morning. A live webcast of the presentation will be hosted by Karl Fitzgerald, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer. A slide presentation will accompany the webcast and will be available on our home page at the time of the call.

Privacy Policy

Protecting Your Privacy

At Altoro Mutual, we maintain physical, electronic and procedural safeguards to protect your nonpublic personal information ï¿½ take a look:

Collection of Information

We collect nonpublic personal information about you from the following sources:

  • From you, on forms, via the Internet, by telephone or otherwise. Examples of this type of information include your name, address, Social Security number, credit history and other financial information.
  • From transactions with us, our affiliates or with others. For example, your payment histories, account balances, and other transaction records.
  • From credit reporting agencies, such as information relating to your creditworthiness, your credit score and credit usage.
  • From third parties to verify information you have given us.

Safeguarding Customer Information

We only grant access to nonpublic personal information about you (such as your name, address, and credit history) to company employees and affiliated and nonaffiliated service providers so that they can provide or offer products and services to you, process and service your accounts, and administer our business.

Our Code of Conduct requires that your information remain confidential. Even if you are no longer our customer, we will continue to treat your nonpublic personal information in the same way as if you were still a customer. In addition, we maintain physical, electronic and procedural safeguards that comply with federal standards to guard this personal information. Some state laws may further restrict the sharing of your nonpublic personal information.

Collection of Information

We collect nonpublic personal information about you from the following sources:

  • From you, on forms, via the Internet, by telephone or otherwise. Examples of this type of information include your name, address, Social Security number, credit history and other financial information.
  • From transactions with us, our affiliates or with others. For example, your payment histories, account balances, and other transaction records.
  • From credit reporting agencies, such as information relating to your creditworthiness, your credit score and credit usage.
  • From third parties to verify information you have given us.

Uses of Shared Information

We may share all the information that we collect, as described above, for the following purposes:

  • To provide you with the products and services you requested.
  • To offer you additional products and services, from us or from others, that may be of interest to you.
  • To comply with reporting and other legal requirements.
  • To otherwise conduct business.

Information Sharing Among Our Family of Affiliated Companies

Altoro, Inc. is the holding company for a group of companies which includes financial services providers such as depository institutions, insurance agencies, mortgage companies, consumer finance companies and securities broker-dealers. Any company that is owned or controlled by Altoro, Inc. is an "affiliate" or an "affiliated company" of all of the other companies owned by Altoro, Inc.

Under the Federal Fair Credit Reporting Act, we are permitted to share your name, address and facts about your transactions and experience with us (such as your payment history and other transactions on your accounts with us) among our affiliated companies. That information is referred to in this Privacy Policy as "transaction information."

Unless you request otherwise, we also share all of the other information we collect among our affiliated companies. This information - that is, information other than transaction and experience information - is referred to in this Privacy Policy as "other information."

You have the right to ensure that other information is not shared among our affiliates. If you prefer that we not share other information among our affiliates, you may opt out.

Guarding Your Own Privacy

Altoro Mutual recommends that you take the following precautions to guard against the disclosure and unauthorized use of your account and personal information:

  • Review your monthly account statements thoroughly and report any suspicious activity to us.
  • Report lost or stolen checks, credit or debit cards immediately.
  • Never provide personal information over the phone unless you have initiated the call and know with whom you are speaking.
  • Do not preprint your driverï¿½s license or Social Security number on checks.
  • Safeguard ATM, credit and debit cards. Memorize PINs (personal identification numbers) and refrain from writing PINs, Social Security numbers or credit card numbers where they could be found.
  • Store cancelled checks, new checks and account statements in a safe place.
  • Tear up or shred any pre-approved credit offers to which you do not respond.
  • Review your credit report at least once every year. Make sure all information is up to date and accurate, and have information relating to fraudulent transactions deleted.
  • If you think you have been a victim of identity theft or fraud, contact one of the three major credit bureaus to place a fraud alert on your account.

Security Statement

Many ways exist to minimize your risk of fraud or identify theft. Altoro Mutual provides you with the following security tips.

Passwords and User IDs

For each computer or online service you use, you should have a user ID and password. Try to create an original password, and make sure you protect it. Commit your password to memory and don't share it with anyone.

The following easily identifiable items should be avoided when creating passwords:

  • Your birth date or a family member's birth date
  • Names of family members or pets
  • Social Security number
  • Phone numbers
  • Dates of important events, such as anniversaries

Tips for creating strong passwords:

  • Use a combination of numbers, letters and punctuation.
  • Longer passwords are better.
  • Make sure it's something you can remember without writing it down.

Install and Use Anti-Virus Programs

Viruses can infect a home computer in many ways: through floppy disks, CDs, e-mail, Web sites and downloaded files. Anti-virus programs help protect your computer against most viruses, worms, Trojans and other unwanted invaders that can make your computer "sick." Viruses, worms and the like often perform malicious acts, such as deleting files, accessing personal data or using your computer to attack other computers. If a file is found to be infected with a virus, most anti-virus programs provide you with options of how to respond, such as removing the harmful item or deleting the file. Installing an anti-virus program and keeping it up-to-date is the best defense for your home computer.

Firewalls: What Are They and How Do I Use Them?

Before you connect your computer to the Internet, you should install a firewall. A firewall can be generally described as a security guard for your home computer. The guard is a piece of software or hardware that helps protect your PC against hackers and many computer viruses and worms. With a firewall, you define which connections between your computer and other computers on the Internet are allowed and which are denied. There are firewall programs, both free and available for purchase, that provide the capabilities you need to help make your home computer more secure.

E-mail Attachments

E-mail viruses and worms are fairly common. Here are steps you can use to help you decide what to do with every e-mail message attachment you receive. You should only open and read a message that passes all of these tests:

  • The know test: is the e-mail from someone you know?
  • The received test: have you received e-mail from this person before?
  • The expect test: were you expecting e-mail with an attachment from this sender?
  • The sense test: does the e-mail subject make sense based on who is sending the e-mail? Would you expect this type of attachment from this person?
  • The virus test: does this e-mail contain a virus?

Purchasing and Installing Programs

Apply these practices when you select software for your home computer.

  • Learn as much as you can about the product and what it does before you purchase it.
  • Understand the refund/return policy before you make your purchase.
  • Buy from a local store that you already know or a national chain with an established reputation.

Keep Your System Up to Date

Most software vendors provide free patches to fix problems in their products. You can usually download these patches from the vendor's Web site. When you purchase a program, it's a good idea to find out how the vendor provides customer support.

Backups

It is a good practice to back up important files and folders on your computer. To back up files, you can make copies onto media that you can safely store elsewhere, such as CDs or floppy discs.

For more information on home computer security, visit http://www.cert.org/.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.

Careers at Altoro Mutual

A Great Place to Work

Altoro Mutual prides itself on its family culture, which is why itï¿½s such a great place to work. We truly believe that our people are the bank's top investment and we invest heavily.

Altoro Mutual also believes in growth. In the last five years alone, four new corporate office locations have been added in New England. This growth means more career opportunities and personal development for our Altoro Mutual family.

Investor Relations

Corporate Profile

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity. Altoro Mutual's success continues to be driven by its personalized customer service and product innovation.

Part of a Corporate Family

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

We're Not Like Other Banks

And you'll realize it right away. Altoro Mutual is about making things better for people ï¿½ our customers, employees and neighbors. We invite you to learn more about our community programs or to read our 2006 community annual report (PDF, 63KB).

Other Altoro Group sites: Altoro Private Bank, Altoro Wealth & Tax

Retirement

In order to attract and retain the best employees in today's competitive job market, it is critical to offer retirement plans and benefits that encourage long-term careers with your company. Altoro Mutual specialists can work with you to create a retirement portfolio that will impress your employees while staying within your company’s budget.

  • 401K
  • Profit Sharing
  • Defined Benefit
  • Executive Savings

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Inside Altoro

In an industry characterized by change, Altoro Mutual is proud of its longevity. Altoro Mutual's success continues to be driven by its personalized customer service and product innovation.

Part of a Corporate Family

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

We're Not Like Other Banks

And you'll realize it right away. Altoro Mutual is about making things better for people ï¿½ our customers, employees and neighbors. We invite you to learn more about our community programs or to read our 2006 community annual report (PDF, 63KB).

Other Altoro Group sites: Altoro Private Bank, Altoro Wealth & Tax

Benefits

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of benefits for both full and part time employees including:

  • Work/Life:
    • On-site Child Care
    • Flexible Time
    • Health Club Membership Discounts
    • Company Discount Program
    • Paid Vacations
    • Paid Holidays (10 per year)
  • Health Plans:
    • Health
    • Dental
    • Prescription Drug
    • Flexible Spending Plan
  • Retirement Plans:
    • 401(K) Defined Contribution
    • Pension Defined Benefit
  • Death/Disability Plans:
    • Short Term Disability
    • Long Term Disability
    • Accidental Death & Dismemberment
    • Life Insurance
  • Performance/Career Development
    • Tuition Reimbursement
    • In-House Training Programs
    • Employee Referral Bonuses

Please note: these benefits may be changed by the bank at any time and are not a contract or guarantee of employment of any kind.

Student Internships

Internships at Altoro Mutual provide a hands-on introduction to our work culture and an opportunity to explore career choices in both traditional and non-traditional banking environments.

Last summer we had several college interns representing colleges and universities across the country. In addition, we offer part-time positions for students during the school year.

All students, regardless of major, are encouraged to apply. To submit your applicaiton, simply select "Summer Internships" or "Part-time Students" from our current job openings list.

Executive Assistant

Category:Administrative
Date:Oct-23-2006

The main purpose of this position is to relieve management of administrative details. You will be expected to answer calls; coordinate schedules, meetings, travel; schedule conference calls and meeting rooms; order supplies, etc.).

You will perform advanced administrative support functions including composing, signing and releasing correspondence. Possessing the ability to maintain a high level of confidentiality is required. Further, you may be involved in high-level client contact and exposure to sensitive information, and must use considerable tact, diplomacy and judgment.

Finally, you will be required to juggle a number of different and often conflicting activities at one time. Time management skills will be essential.

Required Skills:

  • Proficiency in Word, Excel, Outlook and PowerPoint
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Strong communication skills
  • Strong team player

Teller

Category:Banking
Date:Oct-19-2006

Note: this is a full-time position, offering 40 hours per week, Monday-Saturday.

Build customer loyalty through courtesy and friendliness while providing basic teller services. The Teller is expected to:

  • Ensure accurate and timely processing of transactions
  • Resolve basic service issues to guarantee customer satisfaction
  • Via customer education and cross-sell referrals, promote consumer services and products
  • Follow all bank fraud prevention and security procedures
  • Assist other associates as needed

Required Skills:

  • At least one year of customer service or sales experience
  • Excellent inter-personal skills

Loyalty Marketing Program Manager

Category:Marketing
Date:Oct-25-2006

This position is responsible for all direct mail campaigns as part of our Credit Card Loyalty Marketing program. The Loyalty Marketing Program Manager is expected to:

  • Develop innovative creative concepts
  • Manage all aspects of the production process
  • Manage all aspects of the compliance process including submitting creative pieces for legal approval and maintaining documentation surrounding all programs and campaigns

Strong relationship management skills are essential for the success of this position. External contacts may include senior managers at current and prospective affinity partners, print vendors, and enhancement vendors.

Required Skills:

  • Previous marketing or marketing production experience
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills
  • Strong problem solving or analytical skills

Operational Risk Manager

Category:Risk Management
Date:Oct-27-2006

The Operational Risk Manager will partner with the LOB risk manager to communicate and escalate LOB privacy issues to business line management and Compliance Risk Management. The Operational Risk Manager is expected to:

  • Coordinate the implementation of new policies and procedures
  • Establish processes to ensure privacy incidents and security breaches are escalated and resolved in a timely manner
  • Maintain a comprehensive monitoring plan to ascertain the effectiveness of current privacy processes/practices
  • Participate in project work groups related to global privacy issues and initiatives.
  • Provide support, as needed, for privacy training initiatives and privacy-related audit/exams

Required Skills:

  • Information Protection and Privacy experience
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Online Banking with FREE Online Bill Pay
No stamps, envelopes, or checks to write give you more time to spend on the things you enjoy.


Real Estate Financing
Fast. Simple. Professional. Whether you are preparing to buy, build, purchase land, or construct new space, let Altoro Mutual's premier real estate lenders help with financing. As a regional leader, we know the market, we understand the business, and we have the track record to prove it


Business Credit Cards
You're always looking for ways to improve your company's bottom line. You want to be informed, improve efficiency and control expenses. Now, you can do it all - with a business credit card account from Altoro Mutual.

Retirement Solutions
Retaining good employees is a tough task. See how Altoro Mutual can assist you in accomplishing this feat through effective Retirement Solutions. 		Privacy and Security
The 2000 employees of Altoro Mutual are dedicated to protecting your privacy and security. We pledge to provide you with the information and resources that you need to help secure your information and keep it confidential. This is our promise.



Win an 8GB iPod Nano
Completing this short survey will enter you in a draw for 1 of 50 iPod Nanos. We look forward to hearing your important feedback.

Small Business

Altoro Mutual offers a complete range of banking solutions designed to meet the specific needs of small businesses.

Deposit Products

Find out about our different deposit products and decide which options will meet your needs as you strive to grow your business.

Lending

Learn how Altoro Mutual can work with you to find the best finance options available for your business.

Cards

Find out how Altoro Mutualï¿½s line of business credit cards can help better manage corporate expenses.

Insurance

All businesses require insurance but determining the best mix can be difficult. Learn how Altoro Mutual can help you create the best insurance portfolio for your unique needs.

Retirement

Find out how Altoro Mutual can help you create the best retirement plan based on your company size, budget and the amount you can contribute on behalf of your employees.

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of deposit products to help you meet your savings goals. From savings accounts to CDs, from money market accounts to IRAs, each account is designed to give you the best value for your money. Currently, Altoro Mutual is offering the following deposit products:

  • Personal Savings Accounts
  • CDs
  • Premium Money Market Accounts
  • Money Market Accounts
  • IRAs

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Investments & Insurance

Through ongoing service, sound advice and direct access to a variety of investment products, Altoro Mutual can help you develop and reach your financial goals.

Whether you're looking for a short-term solution or a long-term investment strategy, Altoro Mutual offers a full range of account options to help you manage your investments including:

  • Brokerage Services
  • Retirement
  • Insurance
  • Private Banking
  • Wealth & Tax Services

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Bank Regulators Approve Altoro Mutualï¿½s Acquisition Plans

Aug-17-2006

Altoro Mutual today announced that their regulator has approved the company's acquisition plans. The company will be holding a special shareholders' meeting to vote on the transaction.

Assuming shareholder approval at that meeting, the transaction should close on December 1, 2006.

Contact Us

Have a question? It's easy to reach us.

E-mail

Filling out the online form is the most efficient method of contact.If you are requesting a change to your account, please call the phone number listed below.

Phone

To open a new account, please call:
1.800.555.0001
8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Eastern Time, Monday - Friday

For assistance with your account, please call:
1.800.555.0002
24-hour touch-tone banking information is available 7 days a week.

Mail

To contact us by mail, you may send inquiries to:
Altoro Mutual
Altoro Mutual Tower
Anywhere, MA

E-mail Security

Any inquiry you send to Altoro Mutual via our Contact Us page uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. SSL helps to ensure that your personal information remains confidential.

To take advantage of SSL, however, you must have an SSL-compatible browser. Altoro Mutual recommends you use the following browsers:

  • Windows and Unix operating systems: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later.
  • Macintosh: Netscape Navigator 4.08 or later, Netscape Communicator 4.7 or later, and Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.5 or later.

Go to Netscape or Microsoft for downloads.

Mail Subscription

Altoro Mutual often introduces new and exciting promotions. We encourage all visitors to subscribe to our mailing list to receive these incredible offers.




Altoro Mutual is headquartered at the Altoro Mutual Tower in Anywhere, MA.

Investor Relations

Corporate Profile

Altoro Mutual is a subsidiary of Altoro, a multi-state holding company located in the heart of Massachusetts. Altoro Mutual has been serving Boston and surrounding communities for nearly 75 years. With nearly $20 billion in managed assets and over 7,000 employees, Altoro Mutual ranks as one of the fifty largest banks in the United States. Altoro Mutual serves over 6.6 million customers in all 50 states, with more than 90 banking locations in New England alone.

A Great Place to Work

Altoro Mutual prides itself on its family culture, which is why itï¿½s such a great place to work. We truly believe that our people are the bank's top investment and we invest heavily.

Altoro Mutual also believes in growth. In the last five years alone, four new corporate office locations have been added in New England. This growth means more career opportunities and personal development for our Altoro Mutual family.

Management Trainee Program

Take Advantage of Altoro Mutualï¿½s Management Trainee Program

Would you like help finding the perfect career? Then, apply for Altoro Mutual's 18-month Management Trainee Program. While networking with senior executives, you will have the opportunity to experience how each of our businesses work. Here is just a sampling of the experiences you might gain:

  • Rotate through key business units
  • Work on special projects designed to give you valuable work experience
  • Meet & interview senior executives
  • Network with a large group of trainee alumnae
  • Receive career guidance through individual development planning
  • Attend seminars about the banking industry

Candidate Requirements

Altoro Mutualï¿½s Management Trainee program recruits top individuals who meet the following requirements:

  • Degree from accredited 4-year institution of higher learning (Any field of study)
  • Cumulative GPA of 3.5 or above
  • Excellent written & oral communication skills
  • Demonstrated leadership in campus & community organizations
  • A positive attitude & desire for a bright future

What happens after your complete the Management Trainee Program? You determine that! The opportunities at Altoro Mutual are as diverse as its employees.

To apply, select "Management Trainee Program" from our current job openings list.

Deposit Products

Altoro Mutual offers a wide array of deposit products to help you meet your savings goals. From savings accounts to CDs, from money market accounts to IRAs, each account is designed to give you the best value for your money. Currently, Altoro Mutual is offering the following deposit products:

  • Personal Savings Accounts
  • CDs
  • Premium Money Market Accounts
  • Money Market Accounts
  • IRAs

For more information about these products, please contact Altoro Mutual.

Note: all Altoro Mutual deposit accounts include free access to Altoro Mutualï¿½s secure, Online Banking site, where you can view account information, make payments and transfers and more. All this on the internet!
